name: 2.5D Platformer Prototype (Kyle Powers)
description:
A 2.5D Platformer made to learn about platformer game mechanics and using 3D assets on a 2D axis. The mechanics include Player Movement (idle, running, rolling, and jumping), ledge grab and climb system, moving platforms and lifts, ladder climb system, and more using C# and Unity3D.

Controls:
Move - [A], [D], Left Arrow, Right Arrow
Jump - Spacebar
Roll - Left Shift
Climb - [E]
